attributes.action: katie hopkins should apologize for causing offence to muslims, "obese people" and anyone else who she criticizes
attributes.additional_details:
Katie hopkins has caused offence to muslims by tweeting about her prejudicial views on muslims recently especially since "ramadan" has began she also doesn't care what she says and just shoots her mouth off offending whoever and whenever. I feel strongly she should be made to apologize or banned from all media because she doesn't know when enough is enough. i hope you will support me as i'm probably sure she has caused you offence as well!
thank you for taking your time to read this
